001/** This controller provides functionality for adding or updating ingredients in the inventory
002 * @author Aarya Patel
003 */
004package src.controller;
005
006import javafx.fxml.FXML;
007import javafx.scene.control.TextField;
008import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
009import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
010import javafx.scene.Node;
011import javafx.scene.Parent;
012import javafx.scene.Scene;
013import javafx.stage.Stage;
014import javafx.event.Event;
015import src.controller.useful_functions.user_role;
016import src.database.dbConnect;
017import java.sql.*;
018
019import static src.controller.useful_functions.current_user_role;
020import static src.controller.useful_functions.set_current_name;
021import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
022
023import java.io.File;
024import java.io.IOException;
025
026import src.model.ingredient;
027
028
029public class add_inventory_controller {
030
031    /** Text field for entering ingredient name */
032    @FXML
033    private TextField ingredientName_field;
034
035    /** Text field for entering ingredient price */
036    @FXML
037    private TextField price_field;
038
039    /** Text field for entering ingredient expiry time */
040    @FXML
041    private TextField expiryTime_field;
042
043    /** Text field for entering current quantity */
044    @FXML
045    private TextField currentQuantity_field;
046
047    /** Text field for entering minimum quantity */
048    @FXML
049    private TextField minQuantity_field;
050
051    /** Text field for entering order quantity */
052    @FXML
053    private TextField orderQuantity_field;
054
055    /**
056     * This function updates an existing ingredient or creates a new one in the database if it doesn't exist
057     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
058     */
059    @FXML
060    private void handle_enter(ActionEvent event) {
061        String name = ingredientName_field.getText() == null ? "" : ingredientName_field.getText().trim();
062        String price = price_field.getText() == null ? "" : price_field.getText().trim();
063        String expiryTime = expiryTime_field.getText() == null ? "" : expiryTime_field.getText().trim();
064        String currentQuantity = currentQuantity_field.getText() == null ? "" : currentQuantity_field.getText().trim();
065        String minQuantity = minQuantity_field.getText() == null ? "" : minQuantity_field.getText().trim();
066        String orderQuantity = orderQuantity_field.getText() == null ? "" : orderQuantity_field.getText().trim();
067
068        // error handling
069        if (name.isEmpty()) {
070            return;
071        }
072        
073        // Check if this is an update or new ingredient
074        boolean isUpdate = false;
075        try (Connection conn = dbConnect.getConnection()) {
076            PreparedStatement checkStmt = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT ingredientid FROM ingredients WHERE ingredientname = ?");
077            checkStmt.setString(1, name);
078            ResultSet rs = checkStmt.executeQuery();
079            isUpdate = rs.next();
080        } catch (SQLException e) {
081            return;
082        }
083        
084        java.sql.Date currentDate = new java.sql.Date(System.currentTimeMillis());
085        int id = 0;
086        
087        // Parse values with default fallbacks for empty strings and invalid numbers
088        double currentQuantityValue = 0.0;
089        double minQuantityValue = 0.0;
090        double orderQuantityValue = 0.0;
091        double priceValue = 0.0;
092        int expiryTimeValue = 365;
093        
094        try {
095            if (!currentQuantity.isEmpty()) currentQuantityValue = Double.parseDouble(currentQuantity);
096            if (!minQuantity.isEmpty()) minQuantityValue = Double.parseDouble(minQuantity);
097            if (!orderQuantity.isEmpty()) orderQuantityValue = Double.parseDouble(orderQuantity);
098            if (!price.isEmpty()) priceValue = Double.parseDouble(price);
099            if (!expiryTime.isEmpty()) expiryTimeValue = Integer.parseInt(expiryTime);
100        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
101            System.out.println("Invalid number format in one of the fields: " + e.getMessage());
102            return; // Exit if any field has invalid number format
103        }
104        
105        ingredient ingredient = new ingredient(id, 
106                                                currentQuantityValue, 
107                                                minQuantityValue, 
108                                                orderQuantityValue, 
109                                                priceValue, 
110                                                expiryTimeValue, 
111                                                currentDate, 
112                                                name);
113
114        // commit new ingredient to the database
115        try (Connection conn = dbConnect.getConnection()) {
116            conn.setAutoCommit(false);
117
118            if (isUpdate) {
119                StringBuilder updateSql = new StringBuilder("UPDATE ingredients SET ");
120                java.util.List<Object> params = new java.util.ArrayList<>();
121                
122                if (!price.isEmpty()) {
123                    updateSql.append("price = ?, ");
124                    params.add(Double.parseDouble(price));
125                }
126                if (!expiryTime.isEmpty()) {
127                    updateSql.append("expirytime = ?, ");
128                    params.add(Integer.parseInt(expiryTime));
129                }
130                if (!currentQuantity.isEmpty()) {
131                    updateSql.append("currentquantity = ?, ");
132                    params.add(Double.parseDouble(currentQuantity));
133                }
134                if (!minQuantity.isEmpty()) {
135                    updateSql.append("minquantity = ?, ");
136                    params.add(Double.parseDouble(minQuantity));
137                }
138                if (!orderQuantity.isEmpty()) {
139                    updateSql.append("orderquantity = ?, ");
140                    params.add(Double.parseDouble(orderQuantity));
141                }
142                
143                if (updateSql.toString().endsWith(", ")) {
144                    updateSql.setLength(updateSql.length() - 2);
145                }
146                
147                updateSql.append(" WHERE ingredientname = ?");
148                params.add(name);
149                
150                PreparedStatement updateStmt = conn.prepareStatement(updateSql.toString());
151                for (int i = 0; i < params.size(); i++) {
152                    updateStmt.setObject(i + 1, params.get(i));
153                }
154                
155                int rowsAffected = updateStmt.executeUpdate();
156                
157                if (rowsAffected > 0) {
158                    System.out.println("Ingredient updated successfully!");
159                } else {
160                    System.out.println("No rows updated - ingredient may not exist or no changes made");
161                }
162            } else {
163                // insert new ingredient
164                PreparedStatement maxIdStmt = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT MAX(ingredientid) FROM ingredients");
165                ResultSet maxIdRs = maxIdStmt.executeQuery();
166                int nextId = 1;
167                if (maxIdRs.next()) {
168                    nextId = maxIdRs.getInt(1) + 1;
169                }
170                System.out.println("Next ingredient ID will be: " + nextId);
171                
172                PreparedStatement insertStmt = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO ingredients (ingredientid, ingredientname, price, expirytime, currentquantity, minquantity, orderquantity) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)");
173                insertStmt.setInt(1, nextId);
174                insertStmt.setString(2, name);
175                insertStmt.setDouble(3, priceValue);
176                insertStmt.setInt(4, expiryTimeValue);
177                insertStmt.setDouble(5, currentQuantityValue);
178                insertStmt.setDouble(6, minQuantityValue);
179                insertStmt.setDouble(7, orderQuantityValue);
180
181                int rowsAffected = insertStmt.executeUpdate();
182                
183                if (rowsAffected > 0) {
184                  System.out.println("New ingredient added successfully with ID: " + nextId);
185                }
186                else{
187                    System.out.println("Could not add new ingredient");
188                }
189            }
190
191            conn.commit();
192            System.out.println("Ingredient committed successfully!");
193        }
194        catch (SQLException e) {
195            e.printStackTrace();
196        }
197    }
198
199
200
201    /**
202     * This function handles the back click action to return to the view inventory page
203     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
204     */
205    @FXML
206    private void handle_back_click(ActionEvent event) {
207        switch_scene("GUI/view_inventory.fxml", event);
208    }
209
210    /**
211     * Initializes the add inventory page by clearing all text field elements
212     */
213    @FXML
214    public void initialize() {
215        if (ingredientName_field != null) ingredientName_field.clear();
216        if (price_field != null) price_field.clear();
217        if (expiryTime_field != null) expiryTime_field.clear();
218        if (currentQuantity_field != null) currentQuantity_field.clear();
219        if (minQuantity_field != null) minQuantity_field.clear();
220        if (orderQuantity_field != null) orderQuantity_field.clear();
221    }
222}
